item.title: ChatGPT to Fuel $1.3 Trillion AI Market by 2032, New Report Says
item.description: ChatGPT to Fuel $1.3 Trillion AI Market by 2032 A new report by Grand View Research predicts that the global AI market will reach $1.3 trillion by 2032. The report cites ChatGPT as one of the key drivers of this growth.
